text: eewa kiwwe mage kollata.
mata nam naha therenne
"mata than deka thunakin katha karala thiyenawa, mama ehenam ee thanakata yannan mahaththayo....mata eka udawwak karanna ooni mahaththaya.."
jathyantharaෙy lankawata thibuna hama prashnayakma wisandala thibeddi mehema sulu prashnayak hari athiwana ekath walakwanna oona.’
sampath sandip nam tharunaya rajagiriya pradeshayedi riya anathurakata lak kara pala giye amathi champika ranawakama bawata thahawuru wana prabala widyathmaka...
eya pariwarthanayakin awasan we dayi nishchaya lesa kiwa nohaki ya.
bangladesha kandayama samaga pawathwena panduwara 20 krikat tharangaye dewana tharangawaliya sandaha ekwime awasthawa nithya nayaka anjalo mathiwsta ahimi wi thibe.
ithihasaya pura ma pirimin pamanak sidu kala wagakimak kanthawakata pawarima haraha sumanabanda siyum samaja wiplawayakatath dayaka wanawa.
epamana da nowe mathu yam dinakadi sadharana lesa aadayam bedi yame sihinaya malpala ganu athayi yana sundara balaporoththu da ayage sitha thula palapadiyam wi athi bawa awasan padayen hangawe.
onna ehenam hada pathulenma pathanawa subha upandinayak wewa kallak set wewa kiyala.
eyage bila gewwe aanduwa.
maithri mudal amathi wi rawi janapathi wela
paksha aya thamunta chandaya denawa.
11-wasara samanya danuma
ee padam wada katayuthu lesi wenna.

age jiwithayata sathutak labadima thamage ekama sathuta bawata pathkaragath tharuna pashuwedayawarayage sanwedi aadaraye kathawa nam baliya yuthuma winodajanaka (romantik komadi wargaye) chithrapatayak kiyana ekayi mage adahasa nam.
thawakeku samaga naluniliyan, gayaka gayikawan pilibanda oopadupa kathakirima apa ratehi men dadi puruddak ema ratawala daknata labenne natha.
mage piyamayi ee teli natyaya adhyakshanaya kale.
mata eka parata mathak une sunil perera dosthara mahaththayawa.
dan oowa mokatada?
mata ithin ee dakshathawaya nam binduwayi..
mema hithawathkama godanagune ohu hata shri lankawe di muhuna pamata sidu wu gatalukari thathwayan nirakaranaya kara dimata ma paudgalikawama madihath wi ohu hata upakara kirima hethuweni.
mawa mathak wenawa athda?
ehema karana ayata oya kiwwa apala tika aduwak nathiwath..
ithin hina dakkata kamak naha.

danata rate kriyathmaka wana siyalu panathwala nithirithi nishedhanaya kala haki 'sanwardhanaya sandaha wishesha widhiwidhana panatha' namin nawa panathak rajaya wisin langadima parlimenthuwata idiripath kirimata niyamithaya.
tippaniya - dura sitina sathurata wada langa sitina mithuragen parissam wannayi aapthayak thibe.
eheth ee atharama me ratata aadaraya karana, me rate janathawa pida widina dugi bawa gilan bawa nathi kala yuthuyayi hithana deshapalana charithada thibe.
samaharak dishawalin chakrawata ekineka munagasena wita eewa antharkriyakaraka wiya haka: gatima, eekabaddhaya, ekineka ira damima ho, samaharak sanrachaka wasthun maru kara ganima.
adala adhyayana kshethrayehi wu parichaya sambandhayen wimasana wita arthakathacharyawarunge karyabharaya aprameya wuwak bawa pahadili we. …….

shri lanka nidahaspakshaye wyawasthawa anuwa pakshayen janadhipathikenek therunama pakshaye sabhapathi dhuraya janadhipathithumata pawariyayuthuyayi yana kondesiya matha sabhapathi dhuraya maithripala sirisena janadhipathi thumata pawarima ee kondesiyata waradi arthakathanayak dimen kala waradak.
eheth sabawinma sawimath dath wala swabhawika pahaya mada washayen kaha pahayata huru bawa dana sitiyada?
eyata eya karapu pawa me aathmedima palisan dunna.
ohu wenuwen thawamath hitha handa watenawada?
athithaya gana pothak liyanna tharam karunu ma langa thiyenawa.
yathurupadiyakin pamini mema pudgalayin thapal sthanadhipathiwarayata paharadi palagos thibune pereda (06) dinayeyi.
eya aasawen karana de gana hoyala balala, puluwan tharam ee deyata udaw karanna.

thamanne eka wima hewath thama kulayata ayath nisa,nadakam hithawathkam nisa,gamekama nisa chandaya pawichchi kirima mama danna dawase indanma pilikul karapu deyak...lankawata me winnahiya wela thiyenne onna oya aakarayata chande gaththu apathayo deshapalanayata ekathuwima nisaya kiyala mata thawama hithenawa...
sinhalen webi sindiya samaga samibanda wi sitina siyaluma patakayan hata dis wanu aatha.emagin obage bilog adawiyata ihala prekshaka prathicharayak laba gatha haki wanu aatha.
boho mapiyan daruwan hata wali ha mati wishabija aakara men handunwa thahanam kara thibena pasubimaka eki awasaraya da aganeya.
ema poronduwa aagiya athak natha.
ohu thamanta erehiwa idiriyata aa wita ohu podipattam karamin tankiya dhawanaya nokale ayi?
ema kathawa ema sthanaye siti madhya wedinge kamara wala satahan wuna.
aayeth aluth aandukrama wyawasthawak genalla uthurata swayan palanayak laba denna oone naha.

ee salasma nam “muslimwaru dinapatha pawathwana dewa yachnyawa wana pancha kala salathayanhi da eeta amatharawa thama wisin ma kamaththen itu karana salathayanhi da parishuddha wu al kuraanaye kotas kihipayakwath parayana kala yuthuya” yannayi.
samange yodha atha kelin athata mahapata angilla wenakal akkage pukata bahinawa.
ithin ee sasthara karaya aaweshayenma kiyawanna gaththa.
pach ekak dagannada ?”

ehema banina aya dakinne naththe, 19 wani sha. wa. aga bhagaye di thibba kawboyi sanskruthiya saha ithaliyen amerikawata sankramanaya wechcha sisiliyan mafiyawan wani pidakayan, 21 wani sha. wa. weddi naththatama nathiwenna athugala danna samath wela thiyenne nittawata suwa karanna behethak enathek inne nathiwa krama kramayen ee sandaha kapa wechcha, eewa hela daki samajaya wadi wu nisa bawayi.
ada shrilanipaya kalpana karanne idiri mathiwaranawala di ejapaya paradawa thaniwa balaya pihituwa ganima kerehiya.
yamek obe prithiya oben soragaththa nam, oba eyata sthuthiwantha wiya yuthuyi.
ape ammayi nonayi mathak karala ewana eewath danne na.
"pirimi wishwasa karanna ba"

awurudu siyak jiwath wela inna siyalage kale me wage malasamayan sidda nowunath mula mada aga koka kiyannath thiyenne wachana siya nisa ketiyenma kiwwoth me blog eka liyawenne mathrukawa arunama wachana siyakin liyawila thiyena katha witharayi.obe kathawath liyala ewanna.
ara hinganna kiwwalu.

boris pilibandawa adhyayanaya karapu atham aya nam kiyanne yanthranaya pilibandawa boris mathaka thibbath yam pirisak eya minis wargayage ayahapatha wenuwen bhawitha karayi kiyana sakaya matha boris eya heli karanne nahayi kiyala.
siyalla asa siti bhikshun wahanse nagita yannata sudanam wiya.

maha banku badumkara pa්rathamika welendapoledi parpechuwal te්rasharis samagamata miladi ganimata udaw upakara kala hitapu maha banku adhipathi arjun mahendran athulu maha bankuwe hora nadaya heliwi atha.
mama eekata hethuwak danne na.
enam badumakara wanchawa pilibada karunayi.

ithin sammukha parikshanaya sandaha aanandayata ena gamanedith para digata thaththa me parani kathandara siyalla kandata nawatha mathak karannata yedune sammukha parikshanayedi thama sayama noyawana bawata podi pahe anathuru angawimakda samagini !
budu dahamata pamanak nowa hindu , kithunu saha islam aagamata sambandha wisheshitha thana yali godanagiya yuthu thathwayaka thibe .
boksin walalle ha in pitathadi paripurnathwata pathwu ohuge shuddha watinakama amerikanu dolar miliyana 560k bawata ganan bala atha.
namuth ohuta chandaya nodi sitimata balapa karunu rashiyak atha.
ee nathiwata mata jiwath wiya hakiya.
“ekamath eka rateka” ehema….
mage pudgalika adahasa thamayi aadarayatath sima mayim na kiyana eka.
danuma wadi wimath samanga owun samajaye yahapatha pinisa katayuthu karawi kiyaya.
ohugen pasuwa balayata path wu nayakayanta ohuta tharam pupal chinthanayak ha adhishtana shakthiyak nathi wima nisa yam pasubamak hata gath bawa aththayi.
madhyama parisara adhikariye sabhapathi mahacharya mohan lal dharmasiri mahatha da madhya wetha adahas dakwiya.
eke karapu widiyo ekakata peni hitiya.
rejistar unagen passe hondama wade thamayi thaman danna yaluwanta mulinma meka kiyala refla tikak hoyagena inna eka.

dakunu aasiyanu tharagawaliyata 288 deneku sahabhagiwela indiyawei pawathi dakunu aasiyanu tharagawaliyata sadaha 2016 marthu 18 weni dinathi olimipik kamitu mahalekamiwarayage niyogaya nosalaka niladharin ha nirikshakayin 288 deneku sahabhagiwi athi bawata rajya ginum thahawuru kara gena atha.

2009 palath sabha mathiwarana prathipala ha sasanda balimedi sandhanaye kurunagala manthri aasana 24 mewara 23k wi, puththalame aasana ganana 11 mewara 9k wi, mahanuwara aasana 18 mewara 16 k wi mathale aasana 7 mewara nowenas wuwada ema disthrikkaye chanda sankhyawa adu wi athi bawa e.ja.pa. maha lekam thissa aththanayaka mahatha pawasayi.
